text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR
UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS
119 GREGORY HALL
URBANA, ILLINOIS
August 12, 1953
Mr. Graydon Ausmus
Station WUQA
University of Alabama
University, Alabama
Dear Graydon:
The first nine of the scheduled eighteen programs of Document
Deen South were here when I arrived. Thought you!d like to know
they are safely here.
1*11 ask John Holt to give them a listen, and 1*11 join him as
soon as I get a little time.
Regards,
HJSsskh
Executive Director
cc:
John Holt
